label: 在庁官人
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Prominent local individuals, holding managerial office of some type in either shōen estates, or public lands. Prior to 1180, these individuals were also hyakushō, but in the aftermath of the Genpei War, they became the nucleus of the gokenin (tozama) order. [百姓、源平合戦、御家人、外様]
